snippet: Peter Liguori, a longtime television executive, was named the new chief executive after the newspaper and television station owner Tribune Company emerged from a four-year bankruptcy process.
abstract: Peter Liguori, a longtime television executive, was named the new chief executive after the newspaper and television station owner Tribune Company emerged from a four-year bankruptcy process.

headline.main: Tribune Co. Names Chief After Ending Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Tribune Co. Names Chief After Ending Bankruptcy
